text: Ezɨ Karean otarim Johanan, ko gumazir dapanir an gɨn zuiba, me Ismaelɨn dafarimɨn ada ua Mispan gumazamiziba ini. Mɨdorozir gumazir igharaziba ko, men amuiroghboriba, ko atrivimɨn ingangarir gumaziba, me ikɨzir kamɨn tongɨn iti. Gumazamizir kabara, Netanian otarim Ismael faragha Gedalia mɨsuegha gɨvagha, egha kalabuziabar mɨn bar me inigha Mispa ategha Gibeonɨn ghu. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn me bar Gibeon ategha ghue.
